projects.title: NomNom
projects.description: A disguised safety app that helps domestic abuse victims seek help discreetly through a bakery interface.
highlights: Finalist for DMZ x myBlueprint Tech Grant
Implemented secure reporting flow with stealth UI
Used Expo & Firebase for cross-platform deployment

projects.title: QueueMe
projects.description: A lightweight mobile app to streamline waiting times with a quick remote check-in.

projects.title: EmpowerED Website
highlights: Responsive design for both mobile and desktop
Managed team workflows using Git and GitHub

projects.title: BudgetBites
projects.skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Google Chrome API
highlights: Top 4 Finalist at University of Toronto's EWB Hackathon
Developed a responsive website and Google Chrome Extension increasing accessibility to healthier meal options.

projects.title: DeBlizzard
highlights: Designed and developed DeBlizzard to connect seniors to volunteers, addressing social isolation.
Integrated Google Maps API for streamlined user interactions and improved accessibility features.

projects.title: CakeIt
highlights: Developed a Computer Assisted Instruction application to make Java education engaging
Integrated Game Dev features with an in-built parody of the game Cake Artist
